text: A Grand Day Out with Wallace and Gromit, later marketed as Wallace Gromit: A Grand Day Out, is a 1989 British Clay animation|stop-motion animated short film starring Wallace and Gromit. It was directed, co-written, and animated by Nick Park at the National Film and Television School in Beaconsfield and Aardman Animations in Bristol. Category:Clay animation movies
title: A Grand Day Out
